input_email_body:
Subject: System Error Affecting Campaigns

There was an issue with the system that affected the campaigns You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.. It seems there might have been a conflict with the recent software update on the tools. Rebooting and clearing the caches resolved the problem initially. My name is Sophia Rossi.
